participant_1.background:
I lost my beloved bowie knife when I was mugged in New York last year.
I'm looking for a new place to live that is close to my favorite fishing spot.
my favorite book is ender s game.
i wear a lot of purple.
I miss my parents a lot.

participant_2.background:
I'm not rich, but I'm passionate about my writing and I'm learning more about my heritage every day.
my favorite place is the beach.
i plan to raise hell and sew my wild oats.
i have a cat named jasper.
I'm going to watch some Jacob Sartorius music videos on YouTube and study for my upcoming exams.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do?
I like to go to the beach, read, and write.
I like reading too! What are you reading right now?
I am reading a book called The Great Gatsby. It's really good!
I have heard good things about that book. I've read Ender's Game, it's a really good book too.
I've heard of that book, but I haven't read it yet. I'll have to check it out.
You should! It's a really good sci-fi book.
Okay, I will! Thanks for the recommendation!
No problem! What else do you like to do?
I like to go fishing. I love being outside and it's a great way to relax.
I love fishing too! I have a boat and I go fishing whenever I can.
That's awesome! I don't have a boat, so I have to go fishing from the shore.
It's still fun! I love the feeling of catching a fish.
Me too! It's so exciting.
Do you have any pets?
Yes, I have a cat named Jasper. He's a really good cat.
That's great! I love cats.
Me too! They're such great pets.
I have to go now, but it was nice talking to you!
It was nice talking to you too! Have a good day!
You too!
